meta_description: OCCA is the hub of arts opportunities and the "go-to" source for information on Oregon coast arts and culture, connecting residents and visitors to all arts activities in an easy accessible manner.
admission_text:
## **Oregon Coast Jazz Party**

Join us **October 2-4, 2026** , for the annual**Oregon Coast Jazz** **Party!**

****For more than two decades, Oregon Coast Jazz Party has celebrated great live jazz—and the dedicated fans who love it—on the beautiful shores of Nye Beach at the[Newport Performing Arts Center](https://coastarts.org/venues/newport-performing-arts-center/). Enjoy a lively, marvelously music-focused weekend of live jazz in an idyllic coastal location filled with charm, shopping, local brews, and fresh seafood.

We hope to see you here on the beautiful shores of Nye Beach October 2-4, 2026, for what’s sure to be a spectacular weekend!

Session 1: **Friday, October 2 @ 7pm**  
Session 2: **Saturday, October 3 @ 1pm**  
Session 3: **Saturday, October 3 @ 7pm**  
Session 4: **Sunday, October 4 @ 1pm**

**[CLICK HERE](https://coastarts.org/oregon-coast-jazz-party/schedule/)** for session lineup info.

**[CLICK HERE](https://coastarts.org/oregon-coast-jazz-party/)** for more information about the _Oregon Coast Jazz Party_ (now in its 22nd year!)

**[CLICK HERE](https://coastarts.us1.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=9d5525d35ae45ef1d17a69c43&id=09c18e075e) **to join the _Oregon Coast Jazz Party_ mailing list.

[**CLICK HERE** ](https://coastarts.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/PAC-VAC-Dining-Map-Fall-2025-scaled.png)for local dining map

* * *

** __**
